grid.expression: SELECT CAB.NUNOTA AS NroUnico, AD_PEDORIGINAL AS Pedido, LOJAS.NOMELOJA AS Multiloja, NOMEPARC AS Parceiro,EMAIL, DTVENC AS DataDeVencimento, TELEFONE FROM SANKHYA.TGFCAB CAB WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SANKHYA.TGFFIN FIN WITH (NOLOCK) ON FIN.NUNOTA = CAB.NUNOTA INNER JOIN SANKHYA.TGFPAR PAR WITH (NOLOCK) ON PAR.CODPARC = CAB.CODPARC INNER JOIN SANKHYA.AD_PEDIDOVTEXSC PEDIDOVTEXSC WITH (NOLOCK) ON PEDIDOVTEXSC.PEDORIGINAL = CAB.AD_PEDORIGINAL INNER JOIN SANKHYA.AD_LOJA LOJAS WITH (NOLOCK) ON LOJAS.CODLOJA = PEDIDOVTEXSC.CODLOJA WHERE CAB.CODTIPVENDA = 33 AND FIN.DTVENC = :DATAVENC AND FIN.DHBAIXA IS NULL AND CAB.CODTIPOPER = 502 ORDER BY AD_PEDORIGINAL
